syncing summery section history with that of [[Tobacco smoking]]; clairty in Scocial Stigma per request;
Corrected the date of the papal bull of Urban VII - 1642 to 1590
Specified the type of stenosis, since stenosis itself is a very general term
cleanup + cite History section; cleanup See also, defer some links to [[List of smoking related topics]]; image size cleanup for IE
cleanup; flushing out links and references; optimizing images; code cleanup; syntax cleanup;
intergrating Social stigma; added refs; cleanup; next step: Other substanes, and cleanup

restored history section; formations to substances; m sentence to Law; stable version

Reverting possible vandalism by [[Special:Contributions/75.45.168.198|75.45.168.198]] to version by Peter Isotalo. False positive? [[User:ClueBot/FalsePositives|Report it]]. Thanks, [[User:ClueBot|ClueBot]]. (624425) (Bot)
/* External links */ removed site of dubious quality
subsections are in the History, there will be likely one or two more; expasion in Popularization and Emergence, there will likely be more prose, but we aren't there just yet
removing a protection template from a non-protected page ([[User:DumbBOT/Protection|info]])
/* References */ removed ref template per talk
external links are not references; see talk as well
updated template; readded templates to the Standard appendicies: I like the ability to be able to use the target attribute that comes with the ref templates, it's also for consistenty with "Notes"
Date maintenance tags and general fixes
/* External links */ dito for external links
/* References */ removed templates; no need for a smaller font when the list of refs is so relatively short
code cleanup for readability; m portals template to See also; shrunk text size for consistency in Standard appendicies; added Smoking template;
replaced lengthy counter-argument with fact tag; article space is not intended for discussion
Edited the image caption a little, because "ciagrettess burning in an ashtray" is hardly the most common form of smoking today. I'm pedantic, I know! But a little clarity never hurts.
revert; image is more or less unreadable even at higher resolutions
/* Physiology */ A common result of smoking is the characteristic set of facial changes known to doctors as [[smoker's face]].
/* Social stigma */ it's about a previously unknown type of stigma; hence "the"
reverted revert, but moved stigma section back to history and removed "description" heading
revert re-organization; "The social stigma" is intended to describe historical change and "Description" could just as well include the entire article
Protected Smoking: Persistent IP vandalism. Re-protecting. ([edit=autoconfirmed] (expires 09:39, 4 March 2009 (UTC)) [move=autoconfirmed] (expires 09:39, 4 March 2009 (UTC)))
